Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.jackson.core.io.CharacterEscapes

Packages that use CharacterEscapes
com.fasterxml.jackson.core Main public API classes of the core streaming JSON processor: most importantly JsonFactory used for constructing JSON parser (JsonParser) and generator (JsonParser) instances. 
com.fasterxml.jackson.core.json JSON-specific parser and generator implementation classes that Jackson defines and uses. 
 

Uses of CharacterEscapes in com.fasterxml.jackson.core
 

Fields in com.fasterxml.jackson.core declared as CharacterEscapes
protected  CharacterEscapes JsonFactory._characterEscapes
          Definition of custom character escapes to use for generators created by this factory, if any.
